src:
Jadi Direktur Teknik Persebaya, Tugas Uston Nawawi Tetap Sebagai Asisten Pelatih
06 Nov 2019, 12:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Legenda Persebaya Surabaya, Uston Nawawi, didaftarkan sebagai Direktur Teknik (dirtek) ke PT Liga Indonesia Baru. Dia pun bisa duduk di bench sejak pertandingan melawan PSS Sleman pekan lalu.
Namun, meski terdaftar sebagai direktur teknik, tugas Uston Nawawi sehari-hari tetap sebagai asisten pelatih. Dia mendampingi dan memberi masukan kepada pelatih kepala, Aji Santoso.
Menurut Sekretaris Persebaya, Ram Surahman, didaftarkannya Uston Nawawi sebagai direktur teknik semata-mata agar dia bisa duduk di bench, karena tidak ada lagi slot yang bisa diisinya.
"Seumpama coach Uston dimasukkan pelatih fisik, ya tidak pas. Dimasukkan kitman apalagi, pasti lebih rame lagi, seperti tidak menghargai beliau," kata Ram Surahman kepada Bola.net, Rabu (6/11/2019).
"Jadi, slot yang paling memungkinkan untuk bisa masuk di pendaftaran adalah direktur teknik. Tapi sehari-hari dia asisten pelatih, jadi lebih kepada untuk pendaftaran agar dia bisa di bench," tegas Ram.
Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
Being the Technical Director of Persebaya, Uston Nawawi's duty remains as an assistant coach
Nov 6 2019, 12:05 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya legend, Uston Nawawi, was registered as Technical Director (dirtek) to PT Liga Indonesia Baru. He can also sit on the bench since the match against PSS Sleman last week.
However, despite being registered as technical director, Uston Nawawi's daily duties remain as assistant coaches. He accompanied and gave input to the head coach, Aji Santoso.
According to the Secretary of Persebaya, Ram Surahman, Uston Nawawi was registered as technical director solely so he could sit on the bench, because there were no more slots he could fill.
"Like coach Uston was included as a physical coach, yes, it is not right. Including kitman moreover, it must be more crowded, as if he did not appreciate him," Ram Surahman told Bola.net, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
"So, the most possible slot to enter the registration is the technical director. But everyday he is an assistant coach, so it is more for registration so he can be on the bench," said Ram.
Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters.
